global_caption: a scene featuring José wearing a white shirt and beige pants, holding a map in one hand and with the other hand in his pocket, wearing sunglasses; Julia wearing a floral shirt and blue shorts, holding coffee in one hand and a suitcase in the other hand, with no glasses; Diego wearing a green t-shirt and beige shorts, with no glasses and both hands in his pockets; Cristina in a light blue dress, taking a picture with a camera in one hand and holding a straw hat in the other hand; and central European city-style yellow buildings and alley in the background.
